name: The Expert Expert
what_you_do: The Expert Entrepreneur specializes in helping entrepreneurs, speakers, authors, coaches, influencers, service providers, podcasters, and small business owners position themselves as authorities in their fields and create monetizable businesses for sustained success.
who_you_serve: The target audience includes entrepreneurs, speakers, authors, coaches, influencers, service providers, podcasters, and small business owners.
signature_programs: The Expert Entrepreneur, Press and Media Course, 90-Day Quickstart
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, courses, speaking, consulting
bio: Rob Lange has appeared on The Oprah Winfrey Show, Good Morning America, and has worked with notable figures like George Burns, Steve Allen, and Suze Orman.
business_focus: The Expert Entrepreneur specializes in helping entrepreneurs, speakers, authors, coaches, influencers, service providers, podcasters, and small business owners position themselves as authorities in their fields and create monetizable businesses for sustained success. (business coaching)
